text: Ndiya kubajika bemke kwimiqondiso yaM abo baziphatha ngenkukhumalo emhlabeni, ngokungekho lungelweni, kananjalo xa beyibona imiqondiso abayi kukholwa kuyo. Naxa bebona iNdlela yobungcwele abayi kuyithabatha njengendlela, kodwa xa bebona indlela yobugwenxa baya kuyithabatha loo ndlela, oku kungenxa yokuba beyalile imiqondiso yeThu bengenankathalo ngayo
